articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
articles.title: North Korean government hackers snuck spyware on Android app store - TechCrunch
articles.description: Cybersecurity firm Lookout found several samples of a North Korean spyware it calls KoSpy.
articles.content: A group of hackers with links to the North Korean regime uploaded Android spyware onto the Google Play app store and were able to trick some people into downloading it, according to cybersecurity fir… [+4197 chars]
